p: Loss of BW during the CRI exceeded recovery at 24 hours and hemoconcentration occurred, with incomplete return to baseline at 24 hours. Blood urea nitrogen and creatinine were unchanged during the CRI but increased 24 ± 12% at 24 hours. Serum sodium did not change during the CRI but decreased at 24 hours. Serum chloride decreased at hour 5 and did not return to baseline at 24 hours. Hypochloremic metabolic alkalosis and increased anion gap present at hour 5 did not normalize at 24 hours. No differences between treatments were found.
